Combat
Hit Points: 186 Initiative: 3 Armor Class: 16 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Club (+10 1d4+4); Greatsword (+10 2d6+4); Sling (+9 1d4+3 R30/120); Unarmed (+10 1+4)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +3
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Strength Damage Adjustment: +4
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Unarmored Defense (Barbarian): +3 Armor Class in no armor
Ancestral Protectors: First foe struck each rd during rage suffers disadvantage on attacks on others, and its targets also have resistance to damage from the foe, for 1 rd
Brutal Critical: Melee critical hits inflict 3 additional dice of damage
Divine Fury: First hit each rd during rage inflicts +1d6+10 HP of a choice of necrotic or radiant
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Feral Instinct: Has advantage on initiative/Can rage and then act when surprised
Persistent Rage: Can continue raging when unengaged with any foe
Rage Beyond Death: Remains conscious and alive at 0 HP until rage ends
Rage: +4 damage with Strength melee weapons during rage
Raging Storm (Desert): R10' Can use a reaction to inflict 10 HP fire on a successful attacker (save DC 17 Dexterity negates)
Raging Storm (Sea): R10' Can use a reaction to inflict knocked prone with a successful attack (save DC 17 Strength negates)
Raging Storm (Tundra): R10; Can immobilize a target (save DC 17 Strength negates) for 1 rd once per rd
Reckless Attack: During rage, can suffer foe advantage on attacks to gain advantage on Strength melee attacks for 1 rd
Sentinel: Successful opportunity attacks halt the target/Can take an opportunity attack when a foe uses Disengage/Can use a reaction to attack when an adjacent foe attacks another
Shielding Storm: R10' Targets gain resistance to fire during rage
Spirit Shield: R30' Can use a reaction to reduce the damage to a creature by 4d6 HP
Storm Aura (Desert): During the first rd of rage, 10' radius inflicts 6 HP fire; can use a bonus action to repeat the effect throughout rage
Storm Aura (Sea): During the first rd of rage, R10' inflicts 4d6 HP lightning (save DC 17 Dexterity half); can use a bonus action to repeat the effect throughout rage
Storm Aura (Tundra): During the first rd of rage, R10' targets gain 6 temporary hit points; can use a bonus action to repeat the effect throughout rage
Vengeful Ancestors: Spirit Shield inflicts force damage on the attacker equal to the amount prevented
Zealous Presence: R60' Can use a bonus action to give 10 targets advantage on attacks and saving throws for 1 rd once per long rest
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength
Save: Charisma: 0; Constitution: 9; Dexterity: 3; Intelligence: -1; Strength: 10; Wisdom: 0
Save Notes:
Danger Sense: Has advantage on Dexterity vs. visible dangers
Fanatical Focus: Can reroll a failed save once per rage
Rage: Has advantage on Strength saves and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage during rage
Relentless Rage: Can make a DC 10 Constitution save to retain 1 hit point when brought to 0 hit points; each use adds 5 to the DC until a short rest
Storm Soul (Desert): Has resistance to fire and immunity to extreme heat
Storm Soul (Sea): Has resistance to lightning
Storm Soul (Tundra): Has resistance to cold and immunity to extreme cold
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 2; D1: 1 Attack: Barbarian: 6; D: 6 Spell DC: Barbarian: 14; D: 14
Spells:
Augury (Barbarian2 [Consult The Spirits] Divi): Reveals the weal or woe outcome of a proposed act up to 30 min in the future [R]
Clairvoyance (Barbarian3 [Consult The Spirits] Divi): R1 mile Self can see or hear through an invisible sensor for concentration up to 10 min
Healing Word (D1 Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+0 hit points [+Level restores +1d4 hit points]
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights a 10' radius for 10 min; can be used for a ranged spell attack that inflicts 4d8 HP and ends the spell
Thorn Whip (D0 Tran): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP and pulls a Large or smaller target 10'
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 druid cantrips and can cast a chosen D1 spell once per long rest
Consult The Spirits: Can cast Augury or Clairvoyance via spirits once per short rest
Rage: Cannot cast or concentrate on spells during rage
Storm Soul (Desert): Can set unattended flammable objects on fire via touch
Storm Soul (Tundra): Can freeze unoccupied 5' cube of water for 1 min via touch
